title: Delhi Electronic Music Festival
description: Experience the best electronic music artists from India and around the world in a two-day festival at India Gate.

title: Classical Ragas Under the Stars
description: An enchanting night of classical Indian music featuring renowned sitar and tabla maestros performing traditional ragas.

title: Delhi Street Food Festival
description: Explore the diverse street food culture of Delhi with over 100 stalls showcasing iconic dishes from across India.

title: Gourmet Delhi Wine & Cheese Festival
description: Sample exquisite wines paired with artisanal cheeses from India and abroad in this luxurious culinary experience.

title: Delhi Tech Summit 2025
description: Connect with tech leaders, startups, and innovators at India's premier technology conference featuring keynotes and workshops.

title: AI & Machine Learning Bootcamp
description: Intensive two-day workshop on practical AI and ML applications with hands-on sessions led by industry experts.

title: IPL Fan Festival Delhi
description: Meet cricket stars, participate in fan activities, and experience the IPL excitement with giant screens showing live matches.

title: Delhi Marathon 2025
description: Run through historic Delhi in this annual marathon featuring 5K, 10K, half and full marathon courses suitable for all fitness levels.

title: Contemporary Indian Art Exhibition
description: Discover works from emerging and established Indian artists exploring modern themes through various mediums and styles.
location: National Gallery of Modern Art, New Delhi

title: Delhi Street Art Festival
description: Watch artists transform city walls with stunning murals and participate in workshops to learn graffiti techniques.

title: India Startup Investment Forum
description: Connect startups with investors in this premier networking event featuring pitch competitions and investment opportunities.

title: Women Entrepreneurs Summit Delhi
description: Celebrating women in business with keynotes, panel discussions, and networking designed to empower female entrepreneurs.

title: Bollywood Music Awards Night
description: Star-studded evening celebrating the best of Bollywood music with live performances and celebrity appearances.
location: Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium, New Delhi

title: Delhi Comedy Festival
description: Three days of non-stop laughter featuring India's top stand-up comedians and international comedy stars.

title: Holistic Health & Wellness Expo
description: Explore alternative healing practices, yoga, meditation, and nutrition advice from practitioners and wellness experts.

title: Delhi Fitness Challenge
description: Multi-sport fitness competition with categories for all levels, featuring CrossFit, yoga, and strength challenges.
location: Major Dhyan Chand National Stadium, New Delhi

title: International Education Fair Delhi
description: Meet representatives from top universities worldwide and attend seminars on scholarships and application processes.

title: Delhi Science Festival for Schools
description: Interactive science exhibits, competitions, and workshops designed to inspire students' interest in STEM subjects.

title: Delhi Fashion Week 2025
description: Premier fashion event showcasing collections from India's top designers and exciting new talent.

title: Traditional Indian Textiles Exhibition
description: Celebrating India's rich textile heritage with displays of handloom fabrics, demonstrations, and shopping opportunities.

title: Delhi International Film Festival
description: Screening of award-winning international and Indian independent films with director Q&As and industry panels.

title: Bollywood Retrospective: 100 Years of Indian Cinema
description: Celebrating the centenary of Indian cinema with classic film screenings, memorabilia exhibition, and talks by film historians.

title: Delhi Gaming Championship
description: Competitive eSports tournament featuring popular games with cash prizes and the latest gaming tech exhibitions.

title: Indian Board Game Convention
description: Discover traditional and modern Indian board games with tournaments, game design workshops, and family activities.

title: Delhi Spirituality & Mindfulness Retreat
description: Weekend retreat offering meditation sessions, spiritual discussions, and mindfulness practices in a peaceful setting.

title: Sustainable Living Expo Delhi
description: Learn about eco-friendly products, zero-waste lifestyles, and sustainable practices for urban living.

title: India Innovation in Space Conference
description: Explore India's contributions to space science with talks by ISRO scientists and interactive exhibits.

title: National Science & Technology Fair
description: Nationwide competition for young scientists showcasing innovative projects with industry mentorship opportunities.

title: Delhi Auto Expo 2025
description: India's premier automotive exhibition featuring new vehicle launches, concept cars, and the latest automotive technology.

title: Vintage Car Rally Delhi
description: Showcase of classic and vintage cars from across India with parade, judging competition, and enthusiast meetups.

title: Pottery & Ceramics Workshop Series
description: Learn traditional Indian pottery techniques and contemporary ceramic art in this hands-on workshop series.

title: Documentary Filmmaking Masterclass
description: Intensive three-day workshop on documentary storytelling, filming techniques, and post-production with award-winning filmmakers.
location: Film and Television Institute, New Delhi

title: Delhi Climate Action Summit
description: Conference focusing on urban sustainability with pollution reduction strategies and green technology solutions for cities.

title: Yamuna River Cleanup Drive
description: Community environmental action event to clean up the Yamuna riverbanks and raise awareness about water pollution.

title: Classical Dance Festival Delhi
description: Celebrating India's classical dance forms with performances of Bharatanatyam, Kathak, Odissi, and more by master dancers.

title: Contemporary Dance Workshop Weekend
description: Learn contemporary dance techniques, choreography, and expression in this immersive weekend workshop for all levels.

title: Delhi Kids Science & Fun Fair
description: Family-friendly event with science experiments, games, amusement rides, and educational activities for children of all ages.

title: Children's Literature Festival Delhi
description: Celebrating children's books with author readings, storytelling sessions, puppet shows, and creative writing workshops.
location: Indira Gandhi National Centre for the Arts, New Delhi
